main event: A white glowing ball was observed following an airliner at a distance of about three feet.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on January 10, 1958, at 1845 hours., The object was viewed through 8x30 field glasses., The object made no change in direction during the observation., The report was made to the Baltimore Air Defence Filter Center., The observer believed the object was not a balloon or any astronomical phenomena.
witness description: The witness expressed doubt that it was a flying saucer and ruled out astronomical phenomena.
